alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Westchester, Putnam and Rockland Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Peekskill to White Plains. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ossining, Peekskill, Haverstraw, Tarrytown, Mount Kisco, Dobbs Ferry, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Nyack, Carmel, Bronxville, Hawthorne, Upper Nyack, Bedford and Yorktown Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Westchester; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester
